channel.title: Jdk wont work
channel.description: OK so I downloaded the newest version of the Jdk, version 7.0_17. And when I change the run to the source it says java is not recognized as an internal or external command. I havent had this issue before and i'm sure its an easy fix but I cant find it. Any help is appreciated.

item.title: Jdk wont work
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Right click the batch file and open with notepad. Then you will probably see something like : java -Xmx120m -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar

Replace the java with “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe”, so replace it to the path of your new jdk on this example it has jre but yours will be jdk_1_1 something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Jdk wont work
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

You have to set your paths.

Read full topic
